website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for those who make a lot of pies or want to have easy access to common measurements and conversions.
pros: These multipurpose mats are great for counter coverage when kneading, rolling, or measuring dough
Slightly sticky surface clings to counters
Two mats in convenient sizes, small and large, allow to tackle any baking challenge
cons: Although you can use these to prepare your food, you cannot cut on them or it will damage the surface

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The material is fairly thin, but it seems to be holding up well. I have used them both for making Christmas cookies when I discovered my old one was missing. The only reason I gave it a four on cleaning is that they are super flexible, which makes cleaning them in the sink more difficult than the old plastic one I inherited from my mother. But so far they are holding up well. I do hand wash, so I do not know how they will do in a dish washer.
customer_reviews.author: LZuk

customer_reviews.title: Great Non Stick, Oven Safe Mats
customer_reviews.text: These are great for working with dough. When rolling, I'll often use the large one on the bottom and the smaller one on top of the dough, then use the rolling pin. No sticking. I've also used these inside my baking pans when baking to eliminate sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Rivera

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful tool in the kitchen when making pastries
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tool in the kitchen when making pastries. How many times have I rolled out my pie dough and tried to put it in the pan and it wasn't big enough? Not that many, but enough that having this mat makes that mistake less likely to occur. I like having a place to roll out my dough and it makes clean up easier in my opinion. Be advised, however, to not use a pizza cutter on this if you're making dumplings, it will slice right through the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Great for bakers!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these two mats because it's affordable and big enough for me to work on. The small mat I can use it in my small oven and the big mat I primarily use to roll out dough and form the desire size that I want. I love how helpful it is with measurements as well so I do not have to go on my phone or laptop for the conversions. I got the red mats which are quite pretty. I do recommend getting these mats if you are planning to bake cookies or bread or whatever it is. It doesn't take up much space either since you can fold it or roll it up.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: lightweight mats
customer_reviews.text: I really like these baking mats. I had been using a mat given to me 40 years ago. It was a harder plastic and worked well (obviously, for 40 years), but it was beginning to crack and stain. These mats are lightweight and can be rolled up and placed in a drawer in the kitchen. I would puchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These mats stick to counter well
customer_reviews.text: These mats are very nice. Being silicone, they will "stick" to the counter very well. I'm not sure if they if flour gets under them. The larger mat is good for pies or fondant or other things. The smaller one would work for fondant or very small pie crusts. When putting them up, use paper when you roll them. I'm not sure if the mat would stick to itself and you would have a hard time getting it unrolled.
customer_reviews.author: Ranter

customer_reviews.title: So glad I decided to try this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never had this in my kitchen. So much easier to roll out pie crust and cinnamon bun dough. Don't have to stand there with a ruler - all sizes already shown!!!! Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Better than my 'ol Tupperware
customer_reviews.text: After 35 years, my 'ol Tupperware mat finally died. I'd heard about these new silicone one's and decided to take a chance. They work great! They roll up and fit in my drawer and they stick to the countertop and not slide around. So far they're working wonderfully with rolling out dough, etc.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Stays put!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had purchased this mat years ago! It is so nice to have the flour mess on the mat instead of the table. I also love the measurements on it so I know exactly what size to roll my dough. And it's great that it adheres to the surface and doesn't slide around when I am rolling my dough. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: J. Riniker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I used to use those large baking mats that were passed down to me from my mom and they were wonderful, but slid all over the counter when I was using a rolling pin. This stays in place on the counter and is large enough for pierogies, bread, whatever, Very pleased with this product. I would definitely recomend. Very easy clean up too!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2many

customer_reviews.title: Love these mats for dough work
customer_reviews.text: I use these baking mats all the time for rolling out dough (they’re especially great for multi-strand breads where strands should be the same length). With a bit of flour, the mats are virtually non stick & super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kamenetsky

customer_reviews.title: Very usefull product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product dough doesn't stick to it and you can slide it right into the oven. Only thing preventing it from having 5 stars is the writing on the mats could be larger/more legible
customer_reviews.author: J Oliphant

customer_reviews.title: So far it is great, I made flat bread on it and while ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it is great, I made flat bread on it and while it did require a little flour it was much better than old Tupperware pastry mat for sticking, and I baked on it too. Something I could never do with the Tupperware.
customer_reviews.author: annm

customer_reviews.title: A great help in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it a year ago and used it a hundred times since then. VERY easy to clean, just rinse it with water. And that F=C list is really helpful as well, because I cook many American and European recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Driuchenko

customer_reviews.title: Daixers Silicon Baking Mats are great. They are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Daixers Silicon Baking Mats are great. They are easy to use, clean very easily, and are also very easy to store. I will recommend these mats to anyone. Thank you for making them available through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the amateur Baker!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these baking mats, they are exactly what a needed. I use them for sizing pie crusts, puff pastry, dough for tarts, etc. So far they have been wonderful. I've only had them a month or so, but so far they have held up well with use and washing.
customer_reviews.author: Darcey L.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading picture.
customer_reviews.text: Adheres and is non-slip while rolling or kneading. Easy to clean. I purchased these mats so I could use the guide for cutting, as demonstrated in one of the pictures. The instructions on the mats say no knives. I wouldn't have made the purchase had I not been misled by the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna C.

customer_reviews.title: Must need for bakers
customer_reviews.text: works great and love all the measurements on the mat. Great item for baking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted! Quick service too!! ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted ! Quick service too !!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Hagerman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great size and handy markings. Nothing sticks, and easy to clean. A "must" for any baker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love how it doesn't budge on the counter
customer_reviews.text: I love how it doesn't budge on the counter. The fact that dough doesn't stick to it very well is also awesome. I primarily use it for making pizza dough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is vibrant and boot Both are good quality silicone products
customer_reviews.text: Thesent are much nicer than expected. Color is vibrant and boot Both are good quality silicone products.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality! My dough does not stick to the mat and the adhesive stays put on any surface.
customer_reviews.author: Gao Hmong

customer_reviews.title: These mats make it easy to roll your dough
customer_reviews.text: These mats make rolling out dough a snap, especially when compared to trying to roll out on my granite countertops. I've already recommended them to others.
customer_reviews.author: FelisMajor

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t slip when kneading bread dough or rolling out any cookie, yeast, or pie dough. Works exactly as I hoped it would.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Gilbertson

customer_reviews.title: Frayed edges come off like strings
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Frayed edges come off like strings Had to pull the strings off my dough. Didn’t like that part
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These mats are great to keep my island easier to clean after cooking ...
customer_reviews.text: These mats are great to keep my island easier to clean after cooking and baking. They wash up easily and are easy to store. I recommend them for baking and cooking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Thoren

customer_reviews.title: ... I have used them several times and they work great.
customer_reviews.text: Felt thin and a little "cheap" but I have used them several times and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: kingfish76

customer_reviews.title: The edges fray
customer_reviews.text: I've used them a handful of times and the edges are already fraying
customer_reviews.author: Amie Garrabrants

customer_reviews.title: Only one mat received
customer_reviews.text: I only received 1 mat . I received the large mat. NO small mat. I chose this purchase because of the 2 different sizes..I want what I paid for..
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: It stays in place!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace a Tupperware mat that finally gave out. All I can say is where have these been all my life. As I got ready to make my Thanksgiving pies, I unrolled my new mat and stuck it to the counter. Guess what, it stayed. It didn't move around when I rolled out my pie crust, it was easy to clean and it make making pies much easier. You don't have to bother with weighting corners down and hoping the mat doesn't move around when you roll out dough. It just stays in place. I love this mat!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: wifes happy so am I.
customer_reviews.text: wife loved it what else matters oh by the way she is a tremendous baker.
customer_reviews.author: munch

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to use. Attach on counter-top very flatly. It made my fondant work so easy. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Yanan Hou

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good product, could use a storage tube
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, but a little hard to store. Most baking mats I've bought come with a nice tube, I roll them up and store them. Easy. I'll have to save my next paper towel roll, and it'll be fine. For the price, it's still a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: E. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: nice update to old fashioned pastry cloth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly because of the smaller mat. I have been experimenting with small batch baking and so far this has proved useful. I did not seem to slip around while I was rolling out dough. The pastry dough I was rolling did not stick to the mat. And it cleaned up nicely. Best of all, the smaller mat fits well in small spaces. I'm sure to get plenty of use out of the larger mat, which is why I bought the set rather than JUST a mini mat.
customer_reviews.author: monkeywrench

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what it is
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and store very nicely. They stick to the counter very well, which is the main drawback to other ones I've used. Also, they seem to be very well made (i.e., they don't feel like they'll fall apart or rip easily). I still wouldn't cut anything on/near them, but they feel like they're much less likely to get nicked up or fray/rip if you need to use a dough cutter to scrape horizontally across the mat, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nick L

customer_reviews.title: great mat
customer_reviews.text: this mat is much thinner that our old tupperware one that we have had forever, it lays flat and sticks nicely to the counter top which is great, its nice and flexable for easy clean up, our old one would curl up and was rather stiff and hard to handle, i was impressed with how much easier this mat was to work with, it may be thinner but seems to be very tough material, we love it, dont have much use for the small mat thats included but what the hay, the price is fine for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: These silicone mats are great! They make rolling dough an easy task and clean up is a breeze! I really like the measurements along the edges and the little cheater conversion chats are a great addition as well! The larger on also has various measurements for circles in the center so its got you covered for rolling a specific size of dough whether its circular or rectangular! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great for rolling out dough
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I was tired of having my dough stick to the counter when rolling it out. These are great, they don't stick at all and have the handi sizing chart on them. A must have for rolling out dough.
customer_reviews.author: Huff Garage

customer_reviews.title: Great surface for working dough.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for working the bread dough I just made. I used if floured to shape the final loaf and it worked well. Measurements on it make it easy to gauge sizes and roll out to the right size. Keeps from having to clean the counter so much with just a small amount of flour going over the edge. Does not slip when rolling or kneading dough.
customer_reviews.author: J. Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mat
customer_reviews.text: The quality of my pies has improved due to using the mat for pies and for baking. Only drawback for not giving five stars is that some of the smaller fonts are not clear, a bit fuzzy and not dark enough do a bit illegible but works well in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: 57chevy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one these before and my DIL fell in love with it so I got one for her and my granddaughter. They work really well and the small one was a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: DeDe Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, quite big and I love that it has all the measurements, both in US and EU scale. Only problem with it is that it has a weird smell, it doesn't affect anything I'm baking on it, just I don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a Rubbermaid type, stiffer mat. It was thin and felt sticky, I think silicone is supposed to be that way...
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Howe

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I got this set primarily for the larger mat. My girlfriend has a huge one which works great but is hard to clean. This one fits in the sink. YAY! These things attract dust so keep them in a paper towel tube.
customer_reviews.author: James Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my use. Not baking cakes but using it in large baking sheet for chicken, legs, wings etc. It's perfect. I used the small one in toaster oven for Texas toast. No mess. They are very easy to clean. I also ordered rack for over the mat to put meat on to crisp them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Finally used the large baking mat and love it! Easy to use. Keeps my granite countertops clean. Easy to Clean and store away. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy clean up. Two sizes were perfect for Mother and Son to use at the same time. Also makes a good surface for play dough and salt clay.
customer_reviews.author: Jayann

customer_reviews.title: This item is awesome! It is exactly what you need to save ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is awesome! It is exactly what you need to save yourself time and effort as it guides you to rolling out the perfect piece of dough. I love it and have added it to my list of "Go To" gift giving list.
customer_reviews.author: rav

customer_reviews.title: These mats are very nice and make my baking a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: These mats are very nice and make my baking a lot easier! I was worried they wouldn't adhere to the counter good but boy was I wrong! It clings to the counter like a magnet and stays in place the whole time!
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: Great for a clean, useful surface to roll out dough.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for making pie crusts. Reassuring to be able to work with this on a table or counter and know the crust iwill turn out perfect, and surface is clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tobie Reiswig

customer_reviews.title: Great for baking!!!
customer_reviews.text: They work great made a dough on it and was able to roll out to desired size. Very useful and easy to use and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Duplisea

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have used both sizes several times. Well made and good deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: So far I like the baking mats
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the baking mats, but I haven't gotten a chance to use them yet. They came on time, they really do stick to the counter which is great for rolling dough and they roll up nice for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Thin mats with lots of useful markings
customer_reviews.text: I like the size markings on the two mats, but I wish they were made of thicker material. If it were made of thicker material, I would have given it five stars. I have silpats that are thicker than these mats.​
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This mat lasted 6 months, used about a dozen times until the silicone started to break and peel off at about the center of the mat. Had to throw it away. Would not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ileen

customer_reviews.title: I love having two different sizes
customer_reviews.text: Products are as advertised. I love having two different sizes. Stick very nicely to counter. Measurements on the mats very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H Tahir

customer_reviews.title: The product itself however was excellent.
customer_reviews.text: the box that contained the items was too small and caused the large mat to form a crease in the middle. The product itself however was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: spyder

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: These are not the quality of the ones I used previously for many years. They are thinner and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Littleton

customer_reviews.title: A great deal!  Many uses!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! I have a very small kitchen with little counter space. I initially bought one of these as a bread dough mat for use on my electric glass cooktop. I discovered that all I need to do is shake it out over the trash can, roll it up, rubber band it and put it away for next time...no need to wash it each time. I will also begin using this with my new induction cooktop. Check it out! You can use these between the pot and the glass to prevent scratching. I love that it comes with two sizes! My granddaughter will use this with playdough. This is a wonderful deal.
customer_reviews.author: Fiddlesticks!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used these before, excited to have more for our Annual Christmas Cookie Making Day.
customer_reviews.author: donna m. rankins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these for working dough, and then as a liner in a sheet pan.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I needed something big like this for prep. work. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good as a counter-top liner
customer_reviews.text: Good as a counter-top liner, but dust sticks to the mat (a wet paper cloth is needed to clean the dust). Did not try baking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lsko

product_meta.title: Daixers Silicone Baking Mats Set of 2,Large 23.62" x 15.74" Small 11.41" x 10.23",Non Stick Non Skid Pastry-Mat with Measurements (Red)
product_meta.description:
Color:Red - Large (23.62" X 15.74")small (11.41" X 10.23")- Heat safe baking mat can be used in the oven or microwave as a liner for your cookware.
- Nonstick surface lets you skip greasing!
- Unlike other silicone mats for baking, it has a fine mesh fiberglass core to prevent wear and tear.
- The nonstick surface is 100% food grade silicone, not BPA-laden plastic.
- Design includes weight, temperature & metric conversions.
- Printed sizing guide lets you make perfectly proportioned cookies and pie crusts.
feature_bullets: Sticks very nicely to counter top or table. Does not move as you roll out the dough.
Materials are stain-proof and stick-resistant: made of food-grade silcone with glass weave
silicone baking mats can withstand temperatures from -40° C to 230° C
Oven safe and freezer safe: provides even heat distribution for baking, AND items can also be laid on the mat and frozen
No chemical odor - Easy to clean and fold for later use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars135 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
